column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I typically start off with the shishito peppers (not spicy at all but I have gotten a killer once in a while) then the tonkatsu spicy ramen with the thick noodles. Make it a combo with the Pork chashu bowl & salad
column2: you will NOT be disappointed. The Pork chashu is a small portion served with rice and an egg. LITERALLY my favorite
column3: I enjoy that little bowl even more than I enjoy their ramen.
